Institution: SCFMS - STATE COLLEGE OF FLORIDA, MANATEE-SARASOTA
Course Description: THREE HOURS LECTURE AND ONE HOUR LAB PER WEEK. A CORPORATE VIEW THAT PROVIDES STUDENTS WITH AN UNDERSTANDING OF CONCEPTS THAT IS FUNDAMENTAL TO THE USE OF ACCOUNTING DATA FOR DECISION MAKING. EMPHASIS IS ON FINANCIAL STATEMENTS, RATIO ANALYSIS, THE ACCOUNTING CYCLE AND CAPITAL STRUCTURE THROUGH THE ISSUING OF STOCK AND BONDS. STUDY OF ACCOUNTING PRINCIPLES FROM A USER AND PREPARER APPROACH.
Transfer Status: GUARANTEED TRANSFER TO INSTITUTION OFFERING SAME COURSE.
